name: Parcello
author: Parcello

sections.description:
This Plugin will enable you to manage your Shipments on parcello.

It will automatically sync your shipments wirh parcello.

By using this Plugin we have to connect with the Parcello API so Plugins data will be shared with Parcello.

We know that your Data is sensible and you are always able to remove all of your Data by removing this Plugin and deletion of your Parcello account.

Feedback is greatly appreciated and we would love to hear from you via the plugin’s support and features page.
sections.changelog:
v1.0.7

  • Fix a bug that updates old shipments

v1.0.6

  • remove dasboard

v1.0.5

  • Performance improvements
  • Remove specialchars on shipment carrier

v1.0.4

  • Removed unnecessary logs

v1.0.3

  • Fix a Bug that prevents our backend from making the optimal forecast

v1.0.2

  • Adding new ways to track shipments

v1.0.1

  • Fixing issues with the token

v1.0.0

  • Initially releasing all necessary functions

short_description: The Parcello plugin connects your wordpress with the parcello api.
